com.esri.mo2.cs.geom
Interface Ring

All Superinterfaces:
Cloneable, Curve, Geometry, Path
All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseRing
public interface Ring
extends Path

Implements a closed Path that forms a simple area object. Polygons consist of one or more Rings. A ring may be an interior or exterior ring in conjunction with a Polygon. A ring can only be inside one ring (i.e. an interior ring can have only one exterior ring). The area of a ring can be used to determine if it is clockwise (positive) or counterclockwise (negative).

See Also:
Polygon, Shape

Method Detail

isInterior

public boolean isInterior()
Determines if this Ring is interior.

Returns:
True, if interior, else False (exterior)

getExterior

public Ring getExterior()
Returns the exterior Ring of this Ring. If this ring is exterior, then null will be returned.

Returns:
the Exterior ring, or null

getArea

public double getArea()
Returns the area of the Ring. (Positive - CCW, Negative - CW)

Returns:
the area of the ring in the ring's units

clem_relateRingBoundaries

public int clem_relateRingBoundaries(Ring ring)
Determines the relationship between two ring boundaries. Whether the rings are interior or exterior plays no part in the result.

Parameters:
ring - the ring boundary to compare to
Returns:
one of the following relationship values:
ClementiniGeometry.DISJOINT,
ClementiniGeometry.OVERLAP,
ClementiniGeometry.CROSS,
ClementiniGeometry.INSIDE,
ClementiniGeometry.CONTAIN,
ClementiniGeometry.TOUCH,
ClementiniGeometry.EQUAL

clem_disjointRingBoundaries

public boolean clem_disjointRingBoundaries(Ring ring)
Determines if two ring boundaries are disjoint. Whether the rings are interior or exterior plays no part in the result.

Parameters:
ring - the ring boundary to compare to
Returns:
a boolean value - True, if the boundaries are disjoint, else False

clem_containEnvelope

public boolean clem_containEnvelope(Envelope envelope)
Determines if a ring contains an envelope. Whether the rings are interior or exterior plays no part in the result.

Parameters:
envelope - the envelope.
Returns:
a boolean value - True, if envelope is complete inside ring, else False

clem_relateRing

public int clem_relateRing(Ring ring)
Determines the clementini relationship between two rings. Whether the rings are interior or exterior plays no part in the result.

Parameters:
ring - the ring to clementini-relate to.
Returns:
the Clementini relationship:
  • ClementiniGeometry.DISJOINT
  • ClementiniGeometry.OVERLAP
  • ClementiniGeometry.INSIDE
  • ClementiniGeometry.CONTAIN
  • ClementiniGeometry.TOUCH
  • ClementiniGeometry.EQUAL

    • clem_equalRing

    public boolean clem_equalRing(Ring ring)
    Determines if two rings are equal in Clementini sense. Whether the rings are interior or exterior plays no part in the result.

    Parameters:
    ring - the ring to compare clementini-equality to
    Returns:
    a boolean value - True, if spatially equivalent, else False
